title: MSCA Digital Finance PhD Training Week
description: Training week on Reinforcement Learning in Digital Finance at University of Twente, February 17-21, 2025.

title: Guest Lecture Series at ING
description: Prof. Osterrieder delivers guest lecture on AI applications in risk management at ING headquarters.

title: MSCA Digital Finance Mid-Term Meeting
description: Mid-term review meeting for the Marie Curie doctoral network with all 17 PhD candidates and supervisors.

title: New MSc Thesis Projects Started
description: Five new MSc students begin their thesis projects at ING, working on federated learning and XAI topics.

title: ING-UT Workshop on Data Analytics
description: Joint workshop bringing together researchers from UT and ING practitioners on quantitative models in finance.

title: MSCA Digital Finance Kickoff
description: Official launch of the Horizon Europe funded doctoral network on Digital Finance with 17 PhD positions.

title: ING-UT Partnership Announced
description: University of Twente and ING Bank sign 5-year collaboration agreement at FinanceCom 2022.
